SELECT M.MENU_CD, M.MENU_NAME, M.MENU_UP, M.MENU_SP, DATE_FORMAT(M.MN_REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MN_REG_DT, DATE_FORMAT(M.MN_MOD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MN_MOD_DT FROM MENU M
AND M.MENU_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND M.MENU_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
ORDER BY M.MN_REG_DT DESC LIMIT #{startCount} , 10

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MENU M
AND M.MENU_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND M.MENU_CD LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%')
SELECT I.ING_NM, R.MENU_AMOUNT, I.ING_UNIT FROM ERP_Schema.RECIPIE R, ERP_Schema.MENU M, ERP_Schema.INGREDIENT I WHERE I.ING_CD = R.ING_CD AND M.MENU_CD = R.MENU_CD AND M.MENU_CD = #{menuCodeOnClick}
SELECT I.ING_CD, I.ING_NM, I.ING_PRICE, I.UNIT_AMOUNT, I.ING_UNIT FROM ERP_Schema.INGREDIENT I WHERE I.ING_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchIngredientName},'%') ORDER BY I.ING_NM
